title: Factoring the Argument Completely
text: $$\ln(ab)$$ is equivalent to $$\ln(a)+\ln(b)$$ by product rule.
speech: the natural log of, a b,  is equivalent to  the natural log of, a plus the natural log of, b  by product rule.
pacedSpeech: the natural log of, a b,
is equivalent to   the natural log of, a plus the natural log of, b
